member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.TestManagement.Common.Internal.WorkItemFieldNames
member.summary:
FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY.
The reference names of various Work Item fileds used by Test Management sub-system.
member.remarks: These constants define the field names used to implement various properties of TestCase. The place to find these is in: vset\common\Methdologies\MSF_Agile\Files\WorkItem Tracking\TypeDefinitions\TestCase.xml
